name: Run 2 Survive
description:
So, R2S [Run 2 Survive] was initially a zombie game.

{ Concept Art 👇 }

You have to run to save yourself from a huge zombie virus attack. This game's development was started with a huge dream of making a survival endless  runner, But it ended up with some random weird endless runner game... 

It was my first game and also very first experience with Unity Game engine and C#. As they always say First game is your worst game but not always the last game you will ever make. I learned a lot during It's designing and Development process. Please Give your Honest review About it. I have already addressed a lot of issues and bugs in the game in my LAST DEVLOG FOR THIS GAME.

CHECK ALL THE DEVLOGS HERE :- R2S Devlogs

Any additional review/Advices will be greatly accepted.

THANKS TO YOU ALL who has already played and all the others there, Give it a shot and write your reviews in the comments. ✌
